title: Stage Lv9-P3-S15
description: Level 9 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The data suggest that customer satisfaction has improved.
Research indicates that this approach is more effective.
learning_points: Level 9 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: The data suggest that customer satisfaction has improved.

sentences.kr: 연구 결과에 따르면 이 접근법이 더 효과적입니다.
sentences.en: Research indicates that this approach is more effective.

sentences.kr: 증거에 따르면 우리 가설이 맞는 것으로 나타났습니다.
sentences.en: Evidence shows that our hypothesis is correct.

sentences.kr: 분석 결과에 따르면 시장 동향이 변화하고 있습니다.
sentences.en: Analysis reveals that market trends are shifting.
Statistics demonstrate that productivity has increased significantly.

sentences.kr: 조사 결과에 따르면 직원 만족도가 높아졌습니다.
sentences.en: Survey findings indicate that employee satisfaction has risen.

sentences.kr: 반복 실험 결과에 따르면 이 방법이 신뢰할 만하다고 입증되었습니다.
sentences.en: Repeated trials confirm that this method is reliable.

sentences.kr: 비교 연구에 따르면 새로운 시스템이 우수한 성능을 보여줍니다.
sentences.en: Comparative studies suggest that the new system performs better.
